mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Member( member_id, pw, ssn, name, regdate, phone, email, profile ) VALUES( #{id}, #{pw}, #{ssn}, #{name}, now(), #{phone}, #{email}, 'defaultimg.jpg' );
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER
SELECT member_id as id, pw, ssn, name, regdate, phone, email, profile FROM Member WHERE member_id = #{search}
select t.num, t.* from (select @rownum := @rownum +1 num, s.* from (select @rownum := 0) r, student s )t where t.num between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
SELECT * FROM student WHERE id like #{search}
select t.num, t.* from (select @rownum := @rownum +1 num, s.* from (select @rownum := 0) r, student s )t where t.name like '%${search}%'
mapper.update: update Member set email = #{email},phone = #{phone} , pw = #{pw} where member_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from Member where member_id like #{search}
